sentences.chinese: 医生，你能把他治好吗？

sentences.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or an animal healthy again after an illness
the act of making someone well again after an illness

sentences.english: He eventually escaped and made his way back to England.
sentences.chinese: 他终于逃脱并返回英格兰。

sentences.english: Eventually, she got a job and moved to London.
sentences.chinese: 最终，她找到了工作并移居伦敦。

detailed_translations.english: after a long time, or after a lot of things have happened

name: typical
trans: adj. 典型的，有代表性的

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

name: fancy
trans: adj. 复杂的；花哨的；昂贵的

sentences.english: Harry took me to a fancy restaurant for our anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 哈里带我去了一家豪华餐厅，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

detailed_translations.english: fancy hotels, restaurants, cars etc are expensive and fashionable
an idea or opinion that is not based on fact
to like or want something, or want to do something

name: narrow
trans: adj. 狭窄的；勉强的；狭隘的

sentences.english: The stairs were very narrow.
sentences.chinese: 楼梯非常狭窄。

sentences.english: a long, narrow band of cloud
sentences.chinese: 窄长的云带

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a small distance from one side to the other, especially in relation to the length

name: recommend
trans: vt. 推荐，举荐；劝告，建议

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

sentences.english: Despite all our efforts to save the school, the authorities decided to close it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们竭力想保住这所学校，当局还是决定把它关闭。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

sentences.english: There are two major political parties in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国有两大政党。

sentences.english: The government’s major concern is with preventing road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 政府关注的大事是预防道路交通事故。

sentences.english: Smoking is one of the major causes of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是引发癌症的元凶之一。

sentences.english: the major developments in computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的重大进步

sentences.english: He’s majoring in Political Science.
sentences.chinese: 他主修政治学。

detailed_translations.english: very large or important, when compared to other things or people of a similar kind
to study something as your main subject at college or university

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

sentences.english: She waits for you on the stoop, and when you pull up in her Saturn and notice the journal in her hand your heart plunges through you like a fat bandit through a hangman’s trap.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门廊等侯着你，当你开着她的车停下来，注意到她手中拿着你的日记本，你的心从你的体内蹦了出来，就像肥胖的歹徒争脱了执行绞刑者的圈套一样。

name: wave
trans: vi. & vt. 挥手，招手，挥舞

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

sentences.english: All I recollect is a grey sky.
sentences.chinese: 我只记得一片灰色的天空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得
detailed_translations.english: to be able to remember something

sentences.english: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.english: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

sentences.english: Cole was recalled to the squad to replace the injured Quinn.
sentences.chinese: 科尔被召回队里代替受伤的奎因。

sentences.english: The cars had to be recalled due to an engine fault.
sentences.chinese: 由于发动机缺陷，那些汽车必须召回。

detailed_translations.english: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

sentences.english: the angel Gabriel
sentences.chinese: 天使加百列

detailed_translations.english: a  spirit  who is God’s servant in heaven, and who is often shown as a person dressed in white with wings

sentences.english: We’re at our hotel, and everything is fine and dandy .
sentences.chinese: 我们在自己的宾馆里，一切都非常好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上等的，极好的（口语）；服装华丽的
detailed_translations.english: very good – often used in a slightly humorous way
a man who spends a lot of time and money on his clothes and appearance

sentences.english: Your tie’s crooked.
sentences.chinese: 你的领带歪了。

sentences.english: narrow crooked streets
sentences.chinese: 狭窄曲折的街道

detailed_translations.english: bent, twisted, or not in a straight line

sentences.english: Follow the arrows to the X-ray department.
sentences.chinese: 顺着箭头指示的方向去X光科。

detailed_translations.chinese: 箭，箭头；箭状物；箭头记号
detailed_translations.english: a weapon usually made from a thin straight piece of wood with a sharp point at one end, that you shoot with a  bow

detailed_translations.chinese: 以箭头指示；箭一般地飞向

sentences.english: roast chicken with peas and carrots
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡配豌豆胡萝卜

detailed_translations.english: a round green seed that is cooked and eaten as a vegetable, or the plant on which these seeds grow

sentences.english: I never play soccer.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不踢足球。

sentences.english: France and Spain will meet in the soccer cup final.
sentences.chinese: 法国队和西班牙队将在足球锦标赛决赛中交锋。

sentences.english: It must be one of those soccer scarfs from England.
sentences.chinese: 那一定是某个英国足球队的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: a sport played by two teams of 11 players, who try to kick a round ball into their opponents’  goal

name: bat
trans: vt. & vi. 用球棒(板)击球

sentences.english: A bat echolocates the direction.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.english: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.chinese: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal like a mouse with wings that flies around at night

name: congratulation
trans: n. 祝贺，恭喜；贺辞；恭贺

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

name: assume
trans: vt. 假定，认为；承担(责任)，就(职)；呈现，显露

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。

sentences.english: When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
sentences.chinese: 到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。

sentences.english: Whoever they appoint will assume responsibility for all financial matters.
sentences.chinese: 不管他们任命的是谁，他都要负责财务方面的所有事务。

sentences.english: These relationships assume great importance in times of crisis.
sentences.chinese: 在危急时刻，这些关系显得尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof

name: do wonders
trans: 创造奇迹，产生神奇作用

sentences.english: Smoking can cause lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会引起肺癌。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two organs in your body that you breathe with

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

name: immune
trans: adj. 有免疫力；不受影响的；免除的

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

sentences.english: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smaller or less in size, amount, or price

name: routine
trans: adj. 常规的，例行的乏味的

sentences.english: John’s departure had upset their daily routine .
sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.english: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .
sentences.chinese: 尽量养成一套习惯。

sentences.english: my daily exercise routine
sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.english: Dressing is a task which we do every day as a matter of routine (= done regularly and not unusual ) .
sentences.chinese: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.english: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

detailed_translations.english: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do
happening as a normal part of a job or process

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

sentences.english: running, swimming, and other forms of aerobic exercise
sentences.chinese: 跑步、游泳及其他有氧健身运动

detailed_translations.english: using oxygen

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that the bone was broken in two places.
sentences.chinese: X光检查显示有两处骨折。

sentences.english: Amelia had inherited her mother’s good bone structure.
sentences.chinese: 阿梅莉亚遗传了母亲的优美骨架。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard parts that together form the frame of a human, animal, or fish body

sentences.english: a gymnastics display
sentences.chinese: 体操表演

sentences.english: We don’t do gymnastics at school.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校没有体操训练。

detailed_translations.english: a sport involving physical exercises and movements that need skill, strength, and control, and that are often performed in competitions

name: stretch
trans: vt. & vi. 伸展，舒展；拉长；伸出；(使)延伸

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

sentences.english: Always stretch before exercising.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

detailed_translations.english: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to reach a long way for something

detailed_translations.chinese: 一段时间； 一段距离；延伸， 连绵； 连绵的一片
detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

name: range
trans: n. (变动或浮动的)范围，界限，区间；一系列

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

name: movement
trans: n. 活动，转动；移动；运动

sentences.english: the dancer’s graceful movements
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈演员优美的动作

sentences.english: reports of troop movements in the area
sentences.chinese: 该地区部队动向的报告

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something changes position or moves from one place to another

sentences.english: unleaded petrol
sentences.chinese: 无铅汽油

sentences.english: petrol prices
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格

sentences.english: The petrol tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 油箱漏了。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from  petroleum that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles

sentences.english: Around one third of our meals should be based on carbohydrate, with roughly one half of these grains being whole.
sentences.chinese: 我们每餐食物应当差不多有三分之一是碳水化合物，大概有一半谷物食品为全麦的。

sentences.english: There have been no studies of the effects of a low carbohydrate diet on pregnancy, so its effect on the fetus, if any, are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 目前为止还没有关于怀孕时低碳水化合物饮食影响的研究，因此如果对胎儿有什么影响也是不知道的。

sentences.english: The reason for this is that carbohydrate consumption stimulates insulin production, which aids the production of muscle glycogen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为是碳水化合物的消耗刺激了胰岛素的分泌，后者对于肌肉糖原产生有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is in foods such as sugar, bread, and potatoes, which provides your body with heat and energy and which consists of oxygen,  hydrogen  , and  carbon

sentences.english: Where do those kids get their energy from?
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

sentences.english: Where do you get your protein?
sentences.chinese: 你从哪里获得蛋白质？

sentences.english: Dairy source of protein and calcium.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛的蛋白质来源和钙。

sentences.english: So, what happens, this is another view of a sodium channel, so this is actually looking a little bit more at the protein structure .
sentences.chinese: 那么，这里发生了什么，这是钠离子通道的另一张图片，在这种蛋白质结构中，它看起来更复杂一点。

detailed_translations.english: one of several natural substances that exist in food such as meat, eggs, and beans, and which your body needs in order to grow and remain strong and healthy

name: average
trans: n. 平均水平，一般水准

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

name: throughout
trans: prep. 自始至终；各处，遍及

sentences.english: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.chinese: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.english: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.chinese: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.english: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

sentences.english: We are open every weekend throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们全年每个周末都对外开放。

detailed_translations.english: in every part of a particular area, place etc
during all of a particular period, from the beginning to the end

sentences.english: Ian came off the squash court dripping with sweat .
sentences.chinese: 伊恩大汗淋漓地离开壁球场。

sentences.english: Beads of sweat appeared on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上冒出了汗珠。

sentences.english: I was sweating a lot despite the air conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 尽管开着空调，我仍是满头大汗。

detailed_translations.english: drops of salty liquid that come out through your skin when you are hot, frightened, ill, or doing exercise
to have drops of salty liquid coming out through your skin because you are hot, ill, frightened, or doing exercise

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.chinese: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

detailed_translations.english: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack

sentences.english: The rules are intended to prevent accidents.
sentences.chinese: 这些规定旨在预防事故。

sentences.english: We were prevented from entering the site.
sentences.chinese: 我们被阻止进入现场。

sentences.english: Wrap small ornaments in paper to prevent them being damaged.
sentences.chinese: 把小饰品用纸包上以免损坏。

detailed_translations.english: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something

name: tissue
trans: n. (人、动植物细胞的)组织；(尤指用作手帕的)纸巾，手巾纸

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

sentences.english: a shop selling camping equipment
sentences.chinese: 出售露营装备的商店

sentences.english: some brand new computer equipment
sentences.chinese: 一些全新的计算机设备

sentences.english: a very useful piece of equipment
sentences.chinese: 一件非常有用的设备

sentences.english: A lot of money was spent on the equipment of the new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 新医院的装备花费巨大。

detailed_translations.english: the tools, machines etc that you need to do a particular job or activity

name: lack
trans: vt. & vi. 没有，缺乏，不足，短缺

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.english: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

sentences.english: All visitors to the apartment building must be announced.
sentences.chinese: 那幢公寓楼的访客都必须通报。

sentences.english: After announcing himself at the reception desk, James was led upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 在接待处通报姓名后，詹姆斯被领上楼去。

detailed_translations.english: to officially tell people that someone has arrived at a particular place

name: put finishing touches to
trans: 对…进行最后的润色或修饰

name: update
trans: vt. 使现代化，更新；向…提供最新信息

sentences.english: The files need updating.
sentences.chinese: 这些档案需要更新。

detailed_translations.english: to add the most recent information to something
the most recent news or information about something

sentences.english: The files need updating.
sentences.chinese: 这些档案需要更新。

detailed_translations.english: to add the most recent information to something
the most recent news or information about something

name: in response to
trans: 对…作出反应；作为对…的回复

name: replace
trans: vt. 用…替换；代替，取代；更换，更新

sentences.english: I’m replacing Sue on the team.
sentences.chinese: 我将接替队里的休。

sentences.english: Lectures have replaced the old tutorial system.
sentences.chinese: 课堂授课取代了旧式的导师制。

detailed_translations.english: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

sentences.english: a professional athlete
sentences.chinese: 一位专业运动员

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

sentences.english: He wants to take on that boxing champion.
sentences.chinese: 他想和那个拳击冠军较量。

sentences.english: When he joined in the boxing I used to second him.
sentences.chinese: 在他参加拳击比赛期间，我一直是他的拳击指导。

sentences.english: Although much less experienced, he gave a good account of him self in the boxing match.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然很缺乏经验， 但在拳击比赛中仍大显身手。

detailed_translations.english: the sport of fighting while wearing big leather  glove s

sentences.english: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.english: the Olympic champion
sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.english: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them

name: court
trans: n. 球场；法院，法庭；宫廷

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

sentences.english: Three plus six equals nine (3+6=9).
sentences.chinese: 3 加6等于9。

sentences.english: The total cost was $10,000, plus 14% interest.
sentences.chinese: 全部费用是1万美元，外加14%的利息。

sentences.english: Daytime temperatures barely reached plus 5˚.
sentences.chinese: 白天的气温仅零上5度。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that one number or amount is added to another
more than zero – used especially when talking about temperatures

sentences.english: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton.
sentences.chinese: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.english: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.english: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.chinese: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

detailed_translations.english: not far away
a short distance from sb/sth; not far away

sentences.english: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

detailed_translations.english: a special building or room that has equipment for doing physical exercise

name: partner
trans: n. 搭档，同伴；伙伴；合伙人

sentences.english: Discuss your worries with your partner.
sentences.chinese: 和伴侣谈谈你的忧虑。

sentences.english: Only 29% of lone parents receive financial support from their former partners .
sentences.chinese: 只有29%的单身家长得到他们前配偶的经济资助。

sentences.english: Clare’s my tennis partner.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔是我的网球搭档。

sentences.english: Take your partners for the next dance.
sentences.chinese: 挑选下一支舞的舞伴吧。

detailed_translations.english: one of two people who are married, or who live together and have a sexual relationship

name: position
trans: n. 处境；位置；姿势；观点；地位

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone is standing, sitting, or lying

sentences.english: I hesitate.
sentences.chinese: 我犹豫。

detailed_translations.english: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous

name: admit
trans: vt. & vi. 承认；招认；准许进入；准许加入

sentences.english: ‘Okay, so maybe I was a little bit scared,’ Jenny admitted.
sentences.chinese: “行了，也许我是有点害怕。”珍妮承认道。

sentences.english: I must admit , I didn’t actually do anything to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，实际上我并没有帮她什么忙。

sentences.english: Admit it! I’m right, aren’t I?
sentences.chinese: 承认吧！我对了，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right
to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right

name: inspire
trans: vt. 激励，鼓舞；启发思考；使产生(感觉或情感)

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: explore
trans: vt. & vi 探究，探索；勘探，勘察

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

sentences.english: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.chinese: 那间小小的预制棚屋被一台巨大的起重机吊走了。

sentences.english: She craned her neck to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 她伸长脖子以便看得清楚一些。

sentences.english: Children craned to get close to him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们伸长脖子想靠近他。

detailed_translations.english: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
If you crane your neck or head, you stretch your neck in a particular direction in order to see or hear something better

sentences.english: I heard a rooster crow.
sentences.chinese: 我听见雄鸡啼叫。

detailed_translations.english: a male chicken

name: inspiration
trans: n. 灵感；鼓舞人心的人(或事物)

sentences.english: The Malvern Hills have provided inspiration for many artists and musicians over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.english: He raised his eyes to the altar as if seeking inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.english: He draws inspiration from ordinary scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他从日常生活中得到灵感。

sentences.english: Mary Quant’s inspiration comes from the glam style of the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉·官的灵感来自70年代的魅惑风格。

sentences.english: He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.english: He has always been a source of inspiration for me.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是我灵感的源泉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵感； 鼓舞人心的人
detailed_translations.english: a good idea about what you should do, write, say etc, especially one which you get suddenly

sentences.english: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.chinese: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.english: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: now, compared with what happened in the past

sentences.english: a work of art by a true master
sentences.chinese: 一件真正的大师之作

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.chinese: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.english: Master of Arts/Science/Education etc
sentences.chinese: 文学/理学/教育学等硕士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at something

sentences.english: It should be no wonder that you have not mastered the understanding of them all. No one ever will.
sentences.chinese: 难怪大家没有全部掌握并理解这些知识，因为根本就没人能做得到嘛！

sentences.english: She was a splendid mimic and loved to imitate Winston Churchill.
sentences.chinese: 她是个出色的模仿者，喜欢模仿温斯顿·丘吉尔。

sentences.english: The Japanese have no wish to imitate Western social customs and attitudes.
sentences.chinese: 日本人无意仿效西方的社会习俗和处事态度。

detailed_translations.english: to copy the way someone behaves, speaks, moves etc, especially in order to make people laugh

sentences.english: His feet were aching from standing so long.
sentences.chinese: 他站了那么久，双脚隐隐作痛。

detailed_translations.english: if part of your body aches, you feel a continuous, but not very sharp pain there
a continuous pain that is not sharp or very strong

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

sentences.english: tree roots
sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.english: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
to grow roots

sentences.english: Emma studies philosophy at university.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

detailed_translations.english: the study of the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil, etc

name: unity
trans: n. 统一体，联合体，整体；团结一致，联合，统一

sentences.english: economic unity
sentences.chinese: 经济统一

sentences.english: European unity
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的一体化

detailed_translations.english: when a group of people or countries agree or are joined together

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

name: backwards
trans: (also backward) adv. 向后；朝反方向

sentences.english: Hannah took a step backward.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜往后退了一步。

sentences.english: She pushed me and I fell backwards into the chair.
sentences.chinese: 她推了我一下，我便往后倒在椅子上。

detailed_translations.english: in the direction that is behind you

sentences.english: The room filled with smoke, and it was becoming difficult to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.english: People are concerned about the quality of the air they breathe.
sentences.chinese: 人们关心他们所呼吸的空气的质量。

sentences.english: Relax and breathe deeply (=  take in a lot of air  ) .
sentences.chinese: 放松，深呼吸。

detailed_translations.english: to take air into your lungs and send it out again
to take air into your lungs and send it out again

name: diagram
trans: n. 简图，图解，图表，示意图

sentences.english: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 这个图表可说明我的意思。

sentences.english: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

sentences.english: A table or diagram containing the name and address range of each peripheral addressable by the processor within the memory space.
sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

detailed_translations.english: to show or represent something in a diagram

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 简图， 图表
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

sentences.english: She’s busy planning her daughter’s wedding.
sentences.chinese: 她正忙着筹备女儿的婚礼。

sentences.english: When is the wedding?
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是什么时候？

detailed_translations.english: a marriage ceremony, especially one with a religious service

sentences.english: a wedding ceremony
sentences.chinese: 婚礼

sentences.english: the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games
sentences.chinese: 奥运会开幕式

sentences.english: The queen was crowned with due ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 女王按照规定的礼仪加冕。

detailed_translations.english: an important social or religious event, when a traditional set of actions is performed in a formal way

sentences.english: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.english: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

detailed_translations.english: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc

name: formal
trans: adj. (穿着、言语、行为等)适合正式场合的，正规的，庄重的

sentences.english: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.chinese: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.english: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.chinese: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.english: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.chinese: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

detailed_translations.english: made or done officially or publicly

name: tradition
trans: n. 传统，传统的信仰(或风俗)

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: Guests toasted the bride and groom with champagne.
sentences.chinese: 客人们以香槟为新娘新郎敬酒。

detailed_translations.english: a woman at the time she gets married or just after she is married

name: eye-catching
trans: adj. 惹人注意的，引人注目的

name: sari
trans: n. 莎丽(南亚妇女裹在身上的长巾)

name: custom
trans: n. 风俗，习俗；个人习惯；光顾

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

detailed_translations.english: the place where your bags are checked for illegal goods when you go into a country

name: impression
trans: n. 印象，感想；影响，效果

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

sentences.english: Take me for thy bridegroom, for I love thee.
sentences.chinese: 让我作你的新郎吧。 因为我爱你。

sentences.english: Many gifts were showered on the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.chinese: 人们纷纷给新娘和新郎送贺礼。

sentences.english: At the wedding party， the bride and the bridegroom expressed that they would live in harmony and mutual respect and grow old together.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼上， 新娘和新郎表示要互敬互爱，白头偕老。

detailed_translations.english: a man at the time he gets married, or just after he is married

name: entrance
trans: n. 进入，出场；入口；进入权；准许加入

sentences.english: the station entrance
sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.english: Bridget made a dramatic entrance into the room.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate etc that you go through to enter a place

name: ordinary
trans: adj. 普通的，平常的；平庸的

sentences.english: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.chinese: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.english: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.english: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
sentences.chinese: 它很不错，因为它是用平易近人的日常语言写的。

detailed_translations.english: average, common, or usual, not different or special

name: romantic
trans: adj. 浪漫的；爱情的；(Romantic) 浪漫主义的

sentences.english: ‘Tom always sends me red roses on my birthday.’ ‘How romantic!’
sentences.chinese: “我过生日时汤姆总是给我送红玫瑰。”“多浪漫啊！”

detailed_translations.english: showing strong feelings of love

name: flight
trans: n. 班机，航班；航程；飞行

sentences.english: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.english: In 1968, the first supersonic airliner took flight (= began flying ) .
sentences.chinese: 1968年，首架超音速客机飞上天空。

sentences.english: When the alarm sounded, the whole gang took flight.
sentences.chinese: 警报响起，一帮人全逃跑了。

detailed_translations.english: a journey in a plane or space vehicle, or the plane or vehicle that is making the journey

name: occasion
trans: n. 特殊场合，盛会；时刻；时机

sentences.english: I’m saving this bottle of champagne for a special occasion.
sentences.chinese: 我要把这瓶香槟酒留到特别的日子喝。

sentences.english: She had met Zahid on two separate occasions.
sentences.chinese: 她遇到过扎希德两次。

sentences.english: This was the occasion for expressions of friendship by the two presidents.
sentences.chinese: 这是两位总统进行友好交流的时机。

detailed_translations.english: an important social event or ceremony

sentences.english: He marched off, whistling a merry tune.
sentences.chinese: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 愉快的；微醉的；嬉戏作乐的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you hope someone will have a happy time at Christmas

name: band
trans: n. 乐队，乐团；一伙，一帮；带；箍

sentences.english: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.english: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.chinese: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.english: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.chinese: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.english: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.chinese: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.english: interviews with band members
sentences.chinese: 对乐队成员的采访

detailed_translations.english: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music

sentences.english: the film’s lavish costumes and spectacular sets
sentences.chinese: 影片中奢华的戏装和壮观的场景

sentences.english: Hallowe’en costumes
sentences.chinese: 万圣节前夕化装服

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn by an actor or by someone to make them look like something such as an animal, famous person etc

sentences.english: Yet, this is also the land of samba and world-class soccer, a country built by European immigrants and African slaves.
sentences.chinese: 但这是一块由欧洲殖民者和非洲奴隶建立的国家，是桑巴和世界顶级水平足球诞生的土壤。

sentences.english: While they have a reputation for drugs and violence, the slums are also vibrant centers of culture, the cradle of samba, and many are perfectly safe to visit with guides.
sentences.chinese: 除了毒品和暴力，贫民窟还有着浓厚的文化气息，它是桑巴舞的发源地，并且很多地方随着向导去旅游是安全的。

sentences.english: If Brazil was noticed at all outside South America, it was for soccer, samba and hyperinflation.
sentences.chinese: 如果当时巴西留意之外的南美，都是足球、桑巴和高通胀。

detailed_translations.english: a fast dance from Brazil, or the type of music played for this dance

name: twist
trans: vi. & vt. 扭转，转动；使弯曲；曲折

sentences.english: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

sentences.english: He smiled, a slow cynical twist of his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了，嘴巴慢慢一歪，带着嘲笑的意味。

detailed_translations.english: to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape
a twisting action or movement

sentences.english: One man began to clap, and others joined in.
sentences.chinese: 一个人鼓起了掌，其他人也跟着鼓掌。

sentences.english: The couple were cheered and clapped on their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇抵达时人群为他们欢呼鼓掌。

sentences.english: The audience clapped politely but without much enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 观众礼貌地鼓了掌，但并不热烈。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your hands against each other many times to make a sound that shows your approval, agreement, or enjoyment
the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

sentences.english: On 29 August the royal army marched into Inverness.
sentences.chinese: 8月29日皇家军队开进因弗内斯。

sentences.english: The police decided not to ban the march.
sentences.chinese: 警方决定不禁止这次示威游行。

detailed_translations.english: if soldiers or other people march somewhere, they walk there quickly with firm regular steps
an organized event in which many people walk together to express their ideas or protest about something

name: current
trans: n. 水流，潮流；电流；思潮

sentences.english: the current President
sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.english: In its current state, the car is worth £1,000.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing now

sentences.english: a pint of beer
sentences.chinese: 一品脱啤酒

sentences.english: We sell draught beer (=  beer served from a large container, not a bottle  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们出售散装啤酒。

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from  malt  and  hop s

sentences.english: Are you going to roast the chicken?
sentences.chinese: 这鸡你是准备烤的吗？

sentences.english: the delicious smell of meat roasting
sentences.chinese: 烤肉的香味

sentences.english: We caught a rabbit and roasted it over an open fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们捉到一只兔子，放在火上烧烤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 烤，焙；烘，烘烤；暴露于某种热力下以得温暖
detailed_translations.english: to cook something, such as meat, in an  oven  or over a fire, or to cook in this way
roasted
a large piece of roasted meat

name: annual
trans: adj. 每年的，年度的；一年的

sentences.english: The school trip has become an annual event.
sentences.chinese: 学校组织的旅行成了一年一度的活动。

detailed_translations.english: happening once a year

detailed_translations.chinese: 年报， 年鉴； 一年生的植物
detailed_translations.english: a plant that lives for one year or season

sentences.english: Is the engine running smoothly?
sentences.chinese: 发动机运转平稳吗？

sentences.english: We were stranded with engine trouble on a deserted highway.
sentences.chinese: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.english: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 1941年，火车可能已由蒸汽机车来牵引了。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make it move

sentences.english: sulphuric acid
sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
sentences.chinese: 一个多汁、略带酸味的苹果

sentences.english: I was expecting another of his acid remarks, but he remained silent.
sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that has a  pH  of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
having a sharp sour taste

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

name: vehicle
trans: n. 交通工具，车辆；手段，工具

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

name: earn
trans: vt. & vi. 赚得；获利；赢得

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

name: hunt
trans: vi. & vt. 寻找，搜寻；打猎，猎杀；追捕

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

name: chain
trans: n. 链子，链条；一系列；连锁店

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

sentences.english: low-income families
sentences.chinese: 低收入家庭

detailed_translations.english: the money that you earn from your work or that you receive from investments, the government etc

sentences.english: How much does it cost per kilo?
sentences.chinese: 每公斤多少钱？

sentences.english: rooms costing £40 per night
sentences.chinese: 每晚收费40英镑的房间

sentences.english: Admission is £9.95 per adult.
sentences.chinese: 成人门票每位9.95英镑。

sentences.english: My car does 12 miles per litre (= for each litre of petrol ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的汽车每升汽油跑12英里。

sentences.english: The meal cost $25 per head (= for or by each person ) .
sentences.chinese: 那顿饭人均花费25美元。

detailed_translations.english: for each

sentences.english: Your hair needs a good comb.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发需要好好梳理一下。

sentences.english: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮跑上楼去梳头发。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for making your hair tidy
to make hair look tidy using a comb

name: package
trans: n. 包，盒；包裹；一套，一揽子

sentences.english: There’s a package here for a Miami Lakes address.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个寄往迈阿密湖的包裹。

detailed_translations.english: something wrapped in paper, packed in a box, and then sent by mail or delivered
to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

name: promote
trans: vt. 促进，推动；促销；提升，晋升

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

name: observe
trans: vt. 遵守；注意到；观察；庆祝

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.english: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.english: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.chinese: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

detailed_translations.english: to see and notice something

sentences.english: the President’s radio broadcast to the nation
sentences.chinese: 总统对全国的广播讲话

sentences.english: an independent nation
sentences.chinese: 独立的国家

sentences.english: the world’s leading industrial nations
sentences.chinese: 世界上的主要工业国

sentences.english: the Cherokee nation
sentences.chinese: 切罗基族

detailed_translations.english: a country, considered especially in relation to its people and its social or economic structure

name: honour
trans: (AmE honor) n. 尊敬，尊重；荣幸；荣誉
vt. 尊重，尊敬；给予表扬；信守

sentences.english: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

detailed_translations.chinese: 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
detailed_translations.english: to treat someone with special respect

name: generation
trans: n. 一代人；代，一代；产生

sentences.english: Like most of my generation, I had never known a war.
sentences.chinese: 和我们这一代的大多数人一样，我并没有经历过战争。

sentences.english: In my generation the divorce rate is very high.
sentences.chinese: 我们这一代人离婚率很高。

sentences.english: the need to preserve the planet for future generations
sentences.chinese: 为子孙后代保护地球的必要性

sentences.english: The story has been handed down from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事是一代一代传下来的。

sentences.english: the generation of electricity
sentences.chinese: 发电

detailed_translations.english: all people of about the same age

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

sentences.english: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 凶手的身份仍未查明。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s identity is their name or who they are

name: previous
trans: adj. 先前的，以往的；稍前的

sentences.english: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about

trans: n. 责任，义务；上班，值班；职责；税

sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

name: precious
trans: adj. 宝贵的，珍贵的；珍奇的，珍稀的

sentences.english: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources
sentences.chinese: 我们星球上的宝贵资源

detailed_translations.english: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

sentences.english: We’re arriving on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在平安夜到达。

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve party
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜的派对

detailed_translations.english: the night or day before an important day

sentences.english: china teacups
sentences.chinese: 瓷茶杯

detailed_translations.english: a hard white substance produced by baking a type of clay at a high temperature

name: plate
trans: n. 盘子，碟子；板块；车牌

sentences.english: The plates were piled high with rice.
sentences.chinese: 盘子里都堆满了米饭。

sentences.english: a beautiful necklace, plated with 22-carat gold
sentences.chinese: 一条漂亮的22开镀金项链

detailed_translations.english: flat and usually round dish that you eat from or serve food on
to be covered with a thin covering of gold or silver

name: sort
trans: vt. 整理，分类；妥善处理

sentences.english: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (= of various different types ).
sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.english: They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

detailed_translations.english: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

sentences.english: pork chops
sentences.chinese: 猪排

detailed_translations.english: the meat from pigs

sentences.english: The dog bit him and made his hand bleed.
sentences.chinese: 那只狗把他的手咬出血了。

sentences.english: The dog’s been badly bitten by fleas.
sentences.chinese: 狗被跳蚤咬得很厉害。

detailed_translations.english: to use your teeth to cut, crush, or chew something

sentences.english: The party was small and select.
sentences.chinese: 团里人员不多，都是经过精心挑选的。

sentences.english: Honorary degrees are handed out to a select few .
sentences.chinese: 荣誉学位颁给挑选出的少数几个人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精选的， 挑选出来的； 优等的， 第一流的
detailed_translations.english: a select group of people or things is a small special group that has been chosen carefully
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc

name: settle
trans: vi. & vt. 定居；结束；解决；决定；使处于舒适的位置

sentences.english: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

sentences.english: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 安放； 调停； 支付， 核算； 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定
detailed_translations.english: to become quiet and calm, or to make someone quiet and calm

name: convenient
trans: adj. 方便的，省事的，便利的，实用的

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.chinese: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

detailed_translations.english: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems

name: neat
trans: adj. 整洁的，整齐的；有条理的

sentences.english: neat handwriting
sentences.chinese: 工整的笔迹

sentences.english: His clothes were always neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服总是很整洁。

sentences.english: Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
sentences.chinese: 房子里的每样物品都干净整齐。

sentences.english: She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
sentences.chinese: 她把书摞成整齐的一堆。

detailed_translations.english: tidy and carefully arranged

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

sentences.english: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

sentences.english: I grabbed a quick snack.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧吃了点零食。

sentences.english: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.english: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.chinese: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal

sentences.english: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯启程前往他位于康涅狄格州的偏远农舍。

sentences.english: The president's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.chinese: 总统特使再次踏上外交之旅。

sentences.english: Any escape, once it's detected, sets off the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑一旦被侦察到，就会触发警报。

detailed_translations.english: When you set off, you start a journey

sentences.english: I played firecracker but I hurt my finger with the fire.
sentences.chinese: 在我玩爆竹的时候，伤着了我的手指。

sentences.chinese: 我们再次飞回来时，卡索科拉已经准备好了。 我们第一发爆竹炸弹径直射进了篝火中。

sentences.english: Red firecracker chaff left behind after store-opening celebrations attests to the optimism of many investors.
sentences.chinese: 市场开张庆典后的爆竹残渣,足以印证多数投资者的乐观情绪.

detailed_translations.english: a small  firework  that explodes loudly

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜的烟火表演

sentences.english: Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫和戴维在后院放烟花。

detailed_translations.english: a small container filled with powder that burns or explodes to produce coloured lights and noise in the sky

name: fortune
trans: n. 机会，运气；巨款；命运

sentences.english: I had the good fortune to work with a brilliant head of department.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.english: Sickness or ill fortune could reduce you to a needy situation.
sentences.chinese: 疾病或厄运会让你穷困潦倒。

sentences.english: I felt it was useless to struggle against fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得跟命运抗争是徒劳的。

detailed_translations.english: chance or luck, and the effect that it has on your life

sentences.english: Colour the tiger lantern brown .
sentences.chinese: 把老虎灯笼涂成棕色。

sentences.english: Lantern owners write riddles on a piece of paper and post them on the lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 灯笼的所有者将谜语写在一张纸条上，然后将纸条展示在灯笼上。

sentences.english: To cheer themselves as well as they could, they made an artificial morning with the lantern, some bread and butter, and their own conversation, the real morning being far from come.
sentences.chinese: 为了尽量使自己高兴起来，他们就用提灯制造出人造的黎明，吃着黄油面包，谈天说地，其实真正的黎明还远没有到来。

detailed_translations.english: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light

sentences.english: See if you can solve this riddle .
sentences.chinese: 看看你能不能猜出这个谜语。

detailed_translations.english: to solve, explain, or interpret (a riddle or riddles)

detailed_translations.chinese: 谜语；粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等
detailed_translations.english: a question that is deliberately very confusing and has a humorous or clever answer

sentences.english: The willow trees cast their shadows all around.
sentences.chinese: 柳荫匝地。

sentences.english: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.chinese: 他很崇拜房子南面的那颗大柳树。

sentences.english: He has also captured pollen from alder, pine and willow.
sentences.chinese: 他还从桤树、松树和柳树上捕捉到了花粉。

detailed_translations.english: a type of tree that has long thin branches and grows near water, or the wood from this tree

sentences.english: He crept back up the stairs, trying to avoid the ones that creaked.
sentences.chinese: 他蹑手蹑脚地回楼上，尽量避开那些嘎吱作响的梯级。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩
detailed_translations.english: if something such as an insect, small animal, or car creeps, it moves slowly and quietly

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者

sentences.english: The children were all in tears .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们全都哭了。

sentences.english: She came home in floods of tears .
sentences.chinese: 她泪流满面地回到家里。

sentences.english: I could see that Sam was close to tears .
sentences.chinese: 我看到萨姆都快哭了。

sentences.english: Bridget suddenly burst into tears and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特突然大哭着跑了出去。

sentences.english: He was fighting back tears as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他一边说，一边拼命忍住泪水。

sentences.english: A lot of people were moved to tears by his story.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都被他的故事感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He kissed her cheek, a gesture that brought tears to her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 他亲了亲她的脸，这个举动让她热泪盈眶。

sentences.english: I must admit I shed a few tears when the school closed.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，学校关闭时我掉过几滴眼泪。

sentences.english: I saw grown men reduced to tears that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天我看到成年男子都流下了眼泪。

sentences.english: ‘Please don’t talk like that,’ Ellen implored him, her eyes filling with tears .
sentences.chinese: “请别那么说。”埃伦恳求道，眼里噙满泪水。

sentences.english: By this time, tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 此时，我已泪流满面。

sentences.english: The tears he shed were tears of joy .
sentences.chinese: 他淌下的是喜悦的泪水。

detailed_translations.english: a drop of salty liquid that comes out of your eye when you are crying

sentences.english: The children were all in tears .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们全都哭了。

sentences.english: She came home in floods of tears .
sentences.chinese: 她泪流满面地回到家里。

sentences.english: I could see that Sam was close to tears .
sentences.chinese: 我看到萨姆都快哭了。

sentences.english: Bridget suddenly burst into tears and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特突然大哭着跑了出去。

sentences.english: He was fighting back tears as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他一边说，一边拼命忍住泪水。

sentences.english: A lot of people were moved to tears by his story.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都被他的故事感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He kissed her cheek, a gesture that brought tears to her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 他亲了亲她的脸，这个举动让她热泪盈眶。

sentences.english: I must admit I shed a few tears when the school closed.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，学校关闭时我掉过几滴眼泪。

sentences.english: I saw grown men reduced to tears that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天我看到成年男子都流下了眼泪。

sentences.english: ‘Please don’t talk like that,’ Ellen implored him, her eyes filling with tears .
sentences.chinese: “请别那么说。”埃伦恳求道，眼里噙满泪水。

sentences.english: By this time, tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 此时，我已泪流满面。

sentences.english: The tears he shed were tears of joy .
sentences.chinese: 他淌下的是喜悦的泪水。

detailed_translations.english: a drop of salty liquid that comes out of your eye when you are crying

sentences.english: a dress with long sleeves
sentences.chinese: 长袖连衣裙

detailed_translations.chinese: [机] 套筒，[机] 套管；袖子，[服装] 袖套
detailed_translations.english: the part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm

name: devot
trans: oneself to 致力，专心，献身

name: earnest
trans: adj. 非常认真的；诚实的，真诚的

sentences.english: a rather earnest young man
sentences.chinese: 相当认真的一个年轻人

sentences.english: Matthews was in earnest conversation with a young girl.
sentences.chinese: 马修斯在和一个年轻姑娘认真地谈话。

sentences.english: an earnest desire to offer something useful to society
sentences.chinese: 为社会做贡献的真诚愿望

detailed_translations.english: very serious and sincere
if something starts happening in earnest, it begins properly – used when it was happening in a small or informal way before

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

sentences.english: We ran for cover as shells dropped all around us.
sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: an exploding mortar shell
sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

detailed_translations.english: a metal container, like a large bullet, which is full of an explosive substance and is fired from a large gun

detailed_translations.chinese: 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置
detailed_translations.english: to remove something such as beans or nuts from a shell or  pod

name: in store (for sb)
trans: 即将发生(在某人身上)，等待着(某人)

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

name: significant
trans: adj. 有重要意义的，显著的

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

sentences.english: The booklet gives a brief description of each place.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子对每一个地方都作了简短的介绍。

sentences.english: Berlin sounds fascinating from your description.
sentences.chinese: 从你的描述来看，柏林是个迷人的城市。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or speech that gives details about what someone or something is like

name: sensitive
trans: adj. 感觉敏锐的；体贴的；敏感的；灵敏的

sentences.english: a very sensitive child
sentences.chinese: 一个很敏感的小孩

sentences.english: a highly sensitive electronic camera
sentences.chinese: 高敏感度的电子摄像机

detailed_translations.english: easily upset or offended by events or things that people say

sentences.english: the immortality of the soul
sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不灭

sentences.english: It was as if those grey eyes could see into the very depths of her soul .
sentences.chinese: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.english: the souls of the dead
sentences.chinese: 亡灵

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person that is not physical, and that contains their character, thoughts, and feelings. Many people believe that a person’s soul continues to exist after they have died.

name: reflect
trans: vt. &vi. 反映，显示；映出(影像)；反射(声，光、热等)；沉思

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

name: capable
trans: adj. 有能力，有才能；能力强的

sentences.english: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

sentences.english: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

sentences.english: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

detailed_translations.english: having the qualities or ability needed to do something

name: awaken
trans: vt. & vi. 唤起，被唤起；(使)醒来

sentences.english: She was awakened by a noise at two in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨两点，她被一个声音吵醒。

sentences.english: Bill slept a little until he was awakened to take his turn on guard.
sentences.chinese: 比尔睡了一会儿，直到被叫醒去换岗。

detailed_translations.english: to wake up or to make someone wake up

name: launch
trans: vt. 使(船)下水；开始从事，发动

sentences.english: A test satellite was launched from Cape Canaveral.
sentences.chinese: 一颗实验人造卫星从卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.english: The organization has launched a campaign to raise $150,000.
sentences.chinese: 为了筹集15万美元，该组织发起了一场募捐活动。

sentences.english: The Canadian police plan to launch an investigation into the deal.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大警方计划对这宗交易进行调查。

sentences.english: The book launched his career as a novelist.
sentences.chinese: 这本书开启了他的小说创作生涯。

detailed_translations.english: to send a weapon or spacecraft into the sky or into space

sentences.english: Even the permanence of America’s success in Iraq is far from guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 甚至美国在伊拉克的成功的持久性也远未得到保证。

sentences.english: Because, despite the fleeting nature of most of my encounters, and despite my own role in their short duration, I think what I have been seeking in some form from all of these men is permanence.
sentences.chinese: 因为，即使大多数和我邂逅的男人们同我只是保持了非常短暂的关系，也无论我在与他们短暂的关系中扮演着什么样的角色，我始终觉得我渴望在这些男人身上得到的是一份持久的关系。

sentences.english: When new or difficult material is presented, almost all listeners are faced with a challenge because human speech lacks the stability and permanence of the printed word.
sentences.chinese: 当面对新资料或难度较大的资料时，几乎所有的听众都会面临挑战，因为人类口语缺乏书面文字的稳定性和永久性。

sentences.english: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.english: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

detailed_translations.english: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is a one-valence element.
sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

name: universal
trans: adj. 普遍的，共同的；普遍存在的

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

sentences.english: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 摘要另写一页。

sentences.english: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentences.chinese: 据说酷刑和草草处决很常见。

detailed_translations.english: a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details
a summary report, statement etc gives the main facts in a report etc without any of the details or explanations

name: feature
trans: vt. 以…为特色，是…的特征

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

sentences.english: Their car was bigger and therefore more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.english: Progress so far has been very good. We are, therefore, confident that the work will be completed on time.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that has just been mentioned

name: issue
trans: n. 重要议题，争论的问题；问题，担忧；(报刊)一期

sentences.english: Silva issued a statement denying all knowledge of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 西尔瓦发表声明，宣称对此事一无所知。

sentences.english: a warning issued by the Surgeon General
sentences.chinese: （美国）卫生局局长发出的警告

detailed_translations.chinese: 发行； 分发， 发出
detailed_translations.english: to officially make a statement, give an order, warning etc
a subject or problem that is often discussed or argued about, especially a social or political matter that affects the interests of a lot of people

sentences.english: a novel by Jane Austen
sentences.chinese: 简·奥斯丁的小说

sentences.english: What a novel idea!.
sentences.chinese: 多么新奇的想法呀！

detailed_translations.english: a long written story in which the characters and events are usually imaginary
not like anything known before, and unusual or interesting

sentences.english: the upper lip
sentences.chinese: 上唇

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

sentences.english: ...the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: …贫富差距。

detailed_translations.english: a big difference between two situations, amounts, groups of people etc

name: context
trans: n. (事情发生的)背景，环境，来龙去脉；上下文，语境

sentences.english: The meaning of ‘mad’ depends on its context.
sentences.chinese: mad一词的意义要视上下文而定。

sentences.english: the political context of the election
sentences.chinese: 此次选举的政治背景

detailed_translations.english: the words that come just before and after a word or sentence and that help you understand its meaning

name: specific
trans: adj. 特定的；明确的，具体的

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

sentences.english: You really ought to quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 你真的应该把烟戒了。

sentences.english: The company ought to be making changes in its marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 公司应该在营销策略上作出改变了。

sentences.english: What sort of crimes ought the police to concentrate on?
sentences.chinese: 警方应当集中打击哪一类罪案？

sentences.english: You were out enjoying yourself when you ought to have been studying.
sentences.chinese: 应该学习的时候你却在外面玩。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone should do something because it is the best or most sensible thing to do

name: particular
trans: adj. 特别的，格外的；特指的；挑剔的

sentences.english: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.english: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.english: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.chinese: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别的，特指的；讲究的；挑剔的，吹毛求疵的
detailed_translations.english: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other

sentences.english: This one in particular.
sentences.chinese: 这个人很特别。

sentences.english: For any place, but in particular for any city to live, you must have faith in it, in its reality and significance.
sentences.chinese: 对于任何地方，特别是对于一个居住城市而言，你必须对它有信心、对它的现实和意义有信心。

sentences.english: The goals and scope, in particular, show you the direction to move.
sentences.chinese: 特别是目标和范围能告诉您下一步工作的方向。

sentences.english: The environment is a popular topic these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今环境是一个热门话题。

sentences.english: The main topic for discussion will be the proposed new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的主要议题是拟建中的超级市场。

sentences.english: a wide range of topics
sentences.chinese: 广泛的话题

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目， 论题， 话题
detailed_translations.english: a subject that people talk or write about

name: collection
trans: n. (同类)收藏品；作品集；募捐

sentences.english: a stamp collection
sentences.chinese: 一批邮票收藏品

sentences.english: a computerized data collection system
sentences.chinese: 计算机化的数据收集系统

detailed_translations.english: a group of objects, often of the same sort, that have been collected

name: section
trans: n. 部分，部门；部件，散件

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

name: mean
trans: adj. 吝啬的，小气的；不善良的，刻薄的

sentences.english: The red light means ‘Stop’.
